/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by modern buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the towering height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees providing a striking contrast to the gray and white of the buildings.
